desc: With one of the lightest folding bikes in Singapore, Freedom Bikes is a Singapore based bike brand who offer free delivery on their unique carbon fibre folding bike. They also have a range of folding bike accessories and their bikes can be test ridden by appointment in Ubi.

layout.text:
Freedom Leggera Carbon Fiber
- Foldable Bike
- Ultra Light Weight
- Portable & Easy to Store
- Fantastic to ride
